channel.title: Posts on MartinLwx's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on MartinLwx's blog

item.title: the exercise 03&04 of MIT.Missing-semester(2020)
item.description: Lecture 03. Editors (Vim) Complete vimtutor. Note: it looks best in a 80x24 (80 columns by 24 lines) terminal window. It is a tutorial for beginners of vim. I will just put some notes which are not mentioned in course here. U command: When we press u in normal mode, we can undo the last command. What U does is fixing a whole line. Ctrl + G: show your location in the file and the file status.

item.title: How to draw a simple relation graph in Python
item.description: Intro The process of drawing a simple relation graph in python can be broken down into 2 steps. Define a graph. Draw a graph. Step 1. Define a graph In this step, we will use the networkx package. Install tutorial If you are using conda, you can just type conda install networkx If you are using pip, you can just type pip install networkx Nodes First of all, you need to create a graph.

item.title: the exercise 01&02 of MIT. Missing-semester(2020)
item.description: Lecture 01. Shell Create a new directory called missing under /tmp 1 > mkdir -p /tmp/missing 📒 -p means Create intermediate directories as required Use touch to create a new file called semester in missing. 1 2 > cd ~/tmp/missing > touch semester Write the following into that file, one line at a time: 1 2 #!/bin/sh curl --head --silent https://missing.

item.title: git lfs 使用指南
item.description: 什么是 git-lfs Github 对文件大小的限制 如果你在命令行用 git push > 50 MB 的文件，你会收到一个 warning，但是你仍然可以正常 push，但是 > 100 MB 的时候就无法 push

item.title: 从混淆矩阵到 F1 score
item.description: 什么是混淆矩阵 每一列表示实际情况，每一行表示我们的预测，这样组合起来就得到了一个混淆矩阵，比如一个二分类的任务，可以画出如下的混淆矩阵⬇️ Positive
